node.detail_zh: 患者是第 76 宗及第 91 宗患者的家庭傭工，一直無出現病徵，她於 2 月 25 日已到檢疫中心， 3 月 3 日深喉樣本不確定，轉介到瑪麗醫院再作檢測，3 月 4 日確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is the domestic helper of the paitents no. 76 and 91.  She has not shown any symptoms.  She went to quarantine centre for examination on Feb 25.   As the deep throat saliva specimen is uncertain, she was transferred to Queen Mary Hospital for further diagnosis.   She was confirmed positive with coronavirus on Mar 4.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 患者為第 76 宗及第 91 宗患者的家庭傭工
node.remarks_en: The patient is the domestic helper of patients no. 76 & 91
